column5: Prepare for a career as an expert actuary with our actuary master's degree at the University of Southampton.You'll have an early advantage in your career with a professional actuary degree that is recognised by the Institute and Faculty of Actuaries.By the end of your studies, you’ll be able to assess and manage risk using advanced actuarial science methods. You can apply what you’ve learned to work as an analyst, or to many other careers that need quantitative skills.You’ll learn how to become an actuary – a specialist who identifies, analyses and manages risks with long-term financial consequences. This expertise is vital in many businesses across the financial services industry.
